Black Sheep: Ostracized by magocratic nobility
Connections: May call in favors from an acquaintance or organization
God Cursed+: Beneficial spells from chosen god's cleric fail, harmful spells do +2 damage and negate arcane resistance
Low Light Vision: Ignores penalties for dim and dark illumination
Magic Forbiddance+: Cannot use or detect magic items
Natural Realms: Treats elfhomes as wilds
Orders: Takes orders from an outside power
